title: Grading Policy
text:
TO BE FINALISED
Quizzes (36%): Three quizzes of 12% each. These are held in the exam 1, 2, 3 slots. Assignments (32%): - Four assignments of ~8% each. - Followed by a viva. - Total number of groups in the course would be <=20. Depending on class size, the groups would be of 2 or 3 students. - The assignments would be graded on the basis of the following rubric: - 50%: Correctness of the code - 25%: Code quality - 25%: Presentation/Conceptual understanding - You get one week to complete each assignment. - The assignments would be released on Monday and would be due on the next Tuesday evening. - Tentative schedule: - Assignment 1: 14 August - Assignment 2: 11 September - Assignment 3: Week 7 - Assignment 4: Week 9 Project (27%): The number of project groups would be <=10. Depending on the class size, the groups would be of 3-5 students. - Tentative schedule: - Project proposal: Week 5 - Project presentation: 22 November Interactive article (5%): Create a Streamlit or similar interactive article for concept explanation.
